PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS which set out the rules for computing the exempt surplus, taxable surplus and underlying foreign tax of a foreign affiliate in respect of a corporation resident in Canada, as provided for in the Budget of February 22, 1994.
